name: Kids Learn
developer: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
description: Kids Learn is amazing useful educational game for everyone. Get ready for educational tour.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later required Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card Storage: 650 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or Later Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card Storage: 1 GB available space
